data.message: Repeating my request.  My best friend "Al Contreras" pasted away in December 2013. I would very much <3 to see his FB look back video and so would his family and friends.

replies.message: Hey Eva. Thank you for reaching out to us about a Look Back video for your best friend. We're sorry for your loss and offer our sincere condolences. You can submit a request for your loved one's Look Back video here:http://on.fb.me/1lv03Qz. -Jenny
There is a link in the help link.  Memorialize and something else for deceased friends and family
i can't even see my video an i have shared pics i'm always sharing posts i cluck the link an it just shows my pic nothing else not fair others get to have one an i can't
mine shows my pic   and says thanks from mark and the facebook team, but won't play
Exactly, Pat Parrott.  Same for me.  Why does it work for some and not others?  Very annoying.
